string.value: I should go see #p9010010# and learn how to make #b#t01012098##k better.
#bMaple Syrup#k? I should get this done right away. I can enhance my Maple Leaf by doing just that? What a bargain!.\n\n#i04001126# #t04001126# #b#c04001126##k / 25

#p9010010# really made the Maple Syrup for me just like that. I wonder if she didn't already have it pre-made. #p9010010# said to come back in 30 minutes and she'll make Maple Syrup for me again. \n I did hear that Maple Syrup can corrode the #t01012098# so I should use it carefully.
Hi! Are you using the #b#t01012098##k well that I gave you awhile ago?
I knew you would love it... Even having one #t01012098# is amazing but did you know you can increase the power of the #t01012098#?
Oh~ You must've heard about it already? It makes sense...after all, you are an adventurer... There's something called #bMaple Syrup#k.

Every year around this time, #bMaple Syrup#k is made by finely crushing #b#t04001126##k and adding heat to it. It's not difficult to make but because mastering the timing and proper temperature is hard, people rarely attempt it. But recently I learned how to make it from #p9000021# and now I'm pretty good at it~
I can confidently Say that I am the best Maple Syrup maker in all of Maple World! To make #bMaple Syrup#k, you'll need #b25 #t04001126##k... Come back to me once you have 25 #t04001126# ready.
You didn't know...? Come back after you learn a thing or two about Maple Syrup.
Collect #b25 #t04001126##k for me. You should be able to easily get them by hunting monsters.
